companyName: Oxendine Barnes & Associates PLLC - Raleigh, NC
description:
Handling a variety of litigation matters, including personal injury and business law issues, our team at Oxendine Barnes & Associates PLLC in Raleigh, North Carolina, is known for returning exceptional results. Our law office has represented countless victims of car accidents, workplace injuries, medical malpractice and nursing home abuse, obtaining awards through settlement and negotiations. We are also adept at navigating the state’s workers’ compensation system.

The attorneys at our law office are members of prestigious organizations such as the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and the North Carolina Bar Association’s Litigation and Workers’ Compensation sections. Attorney Ryan D. Oxendine has been listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100. Fellow attorney Jim Barnes brings years of experience in representing insurance companies to our practice, which is invaluable in anticipating the path a case may take. We have appeared on behalf of clients before state, federal and appellate courts.

Every case we take on begins with a free initial consultation at our law office. We then cater the legal strategy we develop to the needs of each client, ensuring that they feel their concerns have been addressed. In addition to our litigation practice, we also offer services in estate and tax planning. At Oxendine Barnes & Associates PLLC, we accept credit cards.
